title: Here is the complete list of winners and nominees for the 71st Emmy Awards
text:
TV's biggest night is finally here.

On Sunday, the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards will honor the best comedies, dramas, limited and variety series from the last year.

HBO heads into the ceremony with a record-breaking 137 nominations, including 32 for "Game of Thrones," which took its final bow in May. Other shows that had their swan song this year include "Veep" and "Big Bang Theory."

Netflix had the second-most nominations with 117 for shows like "Russian Doll," "When They See Us" and "Ozark."

Like the Academy Awards ceremony earlier this year, the Emmys will not have have a host. However, Fox announced that pop star Halsey, known for her songs "Now or Never" and "Bad at Love," will perform the tribute for the In Memoriam segment. Comedian Adam DeVine, whose credits include "Workaholics," will introduce the variety genre with a special performance, while Thomas Lennon, of "The State" and "Reno 911," will provide commentary during the ceremony for audiences at home.

And the winners are...
description: On Sunday, the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards will honor the best comedies, dramas, limited and variety series from the last year.
